name: To the Top (itch) (UnnU)
description:
Can you make it to the Top?

Use  arrow A (left)  and D (right) ,  and Space (Jump) to make it to the Top
To the top is a 2D platform game that was made through Unity Engine. As of now it contains only one level.

The game is playable though honestly there's a bunch of game aspect needs to improve.

Special thanks to  rvros for the amazing, detailed "Adventurer 1.5"  character sprites. As well as to ansimuz and his "Magic Cliffs Environment" that greatly helps me in terms of creating level  designs.

Comments are greatly appreciated.
